author: .paulharris
content: fyi https://github.com/Consensys/teku/pull/10386 that should make teku compatible - its on master now if you wanted to test with it or anything... it'll be in the next release

author: potuz
content: Clients started introducing online proposer slashings without a slasher, I think most clients support this now

author: potuz
content: This is overcomplicating cause typically an equivocation won't even reach that stage in the store as we block it early on gossip. I like better the approach of just leaving this comment on words on the validator guide, anyway this behavior can be tested with spectests by checking head before and after an equivocation
